alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 18 at 10:10PM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with localized amounts up to 10 inches in the southern Green Mountains. * WHERE...The northern Adirondacks, the Champlain Valley, and central and northern Vermont. * WHEN...Through 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be slow overnight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off to flurries during the pre-dawn hours Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
